alert.note: Alert for Western Grant (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 25 at 8:43AM EST until January 27 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero possible. * WHERE...Western Grant County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to noon EST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
